Package org.openpnp.spi

Interface VisionProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OpenCvVisionProvider
    public interface VisionProvider
    Provides an interface for implementors of vision systems to implement. A VisionProvider is attached to a Camera in configuration and can be commanded by the system to perform a variety of vision tasks.

      void setCamera​(Camera camera)
      Sets the Camera that the VisionProvider should use for image capture.
